name: Wyldmagic
description:
You are the Wizard of the Wellspring. A Mage from the dawn of time, charged with protecting the source of all magic. An evil Sorcerror is sending his minions to destroy the Wellspring, and bring an end to Magic once and for all. Its down to you to stop him. This is your final stand. Will you prevail?

Spells are learned by opening loot boxes, and are randomly generated so you never know what you're gonna get. Its a surprise. 

Post your scores and what wave you reached in the comments.

Note: Im not much of an artist, so the game doesnt look all that great. But the gameplay is fun and challenging.
Note 2: Loot Boxes use in game curency only.

Made with Unity.
